maml:description.maml:para: Adds a public function to your modulebuild based project based on defined templates.
Adds a public function to your modulebuild based project.

maml:Description.maml:para: Name of the function to add. Must use a valid PowerShell verb-action format and be singular.
Ignore function name best practices warnings.

maml:description.maml:para: Retrieves all the stored settings in a buildenvironment.json file.
Retrieves all the stored settings in a buildenvironment.json file.

maml:Description.maml:para: Specifies the path to a buildenvironment.json file.
Specifies the path to a buildenvironment.json file.

dev:remarks.maml:para: If a buildenvironment.json file exists in .\build then the settings within it will be displayed on the screen. Otherwise nothing happens.

maml:description.maml:para: Retrieves private module function definitions and recreates them in your modulebuild based project.

Retrieves private module function definitions and recreates them in your modulebuild based project. This can be used to either upgrade modulebuild for a project or convert an existing module to start using modulebuild. This function will load and then unload the module to work its magic. 'Private' functions are determined by excluding exported functions and using AST to filter out all function definitions in files within the module folder that are not embedded in other functions. This function will not overwrite any existing private function file of the same name.

maml:Description.maml:para: Specifies the path to a buildenvironment.json file for an existing modulebuild project.
An existing module path to target. Must be a psd1 or psm1 file.
Function name to import. If none are specified then all functions will be imported.
Do not attempt to find and insert comment based help into the function. Default for private functions is to skip CBH insertion.
Paths within the root of your module source which will be ignored in this import.
Files, in regex pattern format, that will be ignored in this import.
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs. The cmdlet is not run.
Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.

Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.

maml:alert.maml:para: This only applies to modules of the type 'Script'. Be very careful before importing everything as any wayward functions might get imported and bloat your resulting module needlessly.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Finds all the functions that are in the module source but not exported and prompts for each of them to recreate them as individual ps1 files within your ModuleBuild src\private directory.

maml:description.maml:para: Retrieves public module function definitions and recreates them in your modulebuild based project.

Retrieves module function definitions and recreates them in your modulebuild based project. This can be used to either upgrade modulebuild for a project or convert an existing module to start using modulebuild. This function will load and then unload the module to work its magic.

maml:Description.maml:para: Specifies the path to a buildenvironment.json file for an existing modulebuild project.
An existing module path to target. Must be a psm1 or psd1 file.
Function name to import. If none are specified then all functions will be imported.
Do not attempt to find and insert comment based help into the function.
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs. The cmdlet is not run.
Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.

maml:alert.maml:para: This only applies to modules of the type 'Script' and commands of the type 'Function'.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Finds any non-exported and unembedded functions and automatically creates them in the current modulebuild project private source directory if they don't already exist.

maml:description.maml:para: Set up the framework for a ModuleBuild project.
Set up the framework for a ModuleBuild project. Optionally supply an existing module manifest path to pull in information from it to begin a migration to ModuleBuild.

maml:Description.maml:para: Specifies the path to create the project.
If specified, will import a source module manifest file for module information.
Specifies the path to create the project.
If specified, will import a source module manifest file for module information.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Prompt for all the settings required to get a new modulebuild project setup in c:\work\NewModule.
Pulls some information from myoldmodule.psd1 and then prompt for any remaining required information to create a modulebuild based project from it in C:\Work\NewModule
Prompt for all the settings required to get a new modulebuild project setup in c:\work\NewModule.
